triplets: Preserved food sealed in metal containers (cans) to extend shelf life and maintain edibility
Storing and consuming food, convenient meal preparation, long-term storage, and emergency supplies
Metal (tin-plated steel or aluminum), food-grade lining, sometimes plastic components in lids
Varies depending on labeling, packaging, and type of food
Pantry items, packaged food, long-term storage, and commercial food distribution
Various manufacturers including commercial food processing companies and brands
Varies depending on can size, typically 100 grams to 1 kg
Typically 5–20 cm depending on can size and type
1–5 years shelf life depending on food type, preservation method, and storage conditions
